tool_description: An API that gathers actor information from IMDB
name: What From
title: What From

api_list.name: Get Actor Information
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back the searched actor/actress and the movies/shows they've been in.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://what-from.p.rapidapi.com/actor/Tom Hanks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "what-from.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://what-from.p.rapidapi.com/actor/{actorname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "what-from.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
